blogPost.excerpt: A bot who helps to monitor Elon's twitter and notify you instantly via Discord app. You no longer have to keep refreshing on his twitter, or mess up your twitter notifications to just follow him.
blogPost.body: A bot who helps to monitor Elon's twitter and notify you instantly via Discord app. You no longer have to keep refreshing on his twitter, or mess up your twitter notifications to just follow him.
blogPost.title: Trade on Elon Tweets - Never missed any tweet, go buying before everyone knows.
blogPost.author: Tony Phung

localize.description: 一个帮助监控Elon的twitter并通过Discord应用即时通知你的机器人。你再也不用不停地刷新他的微博，也不用为了关注他而搞乱你的微博通知了。
localize.tagline: 从来没有错过任何一条微博，趁大家还没知道，赶紧去买吧。

localize.description: 一個幫助監控Elon的twitter並通過Discord應用即時通知你的機器人。你再也不用不停地刷新他的微博，也不用爲了關注他而搞亂你的微博通知了。
localize.tagline: 從來沒有錯過任何一條微博，趁大家還沒知道，趕緊去買吧。

previous.excerpt: Appect is a magical landing page builder for mobile app owners that converts store links into landing pages in a seconds. You can create unlimited landing pages by picking from our beautifully crafted themes, track visitors and downloads and collect feedback!
previous.title: Appect - Turn your store link into a cool landing page in seconds

localize.description: Appect是一个神奇的登陆页面生成器，为移动应用程序所有者，在几秒钟内将商店链接转换为登陆页面。您可以从我们精美的主题中选择创建无限的着陆页，跟踪访问者和下载，并收集反馈意见!
localize.tagline: 在几秒钟内将您的商店链接变成一个很酷的登陆页面。

localize.description: Appect是一個神奇的登陸頁面生成器，爲移動應用程序所有者，在幾秒鐘內將商店鏈接轉換爲登陸頁面。您可以從我們精美的主題中選擇創建無限的着陸頁，跟蹤訪問者和下載，並收集反饋意見!
localize.tagline: 在幾秒鐘內將您的商店鏈接變成一個很酷的登陸頁面。

next.excerpt: Learn faster, earn more and become a true unicorn developer! Discover how to learn, understand design, business and what skills are essential to grow as a developer. Master the tools & methods, and you’ll feel confident in both small & large-scale projects.
next.title: Frontend Unicorn - Level up as a junior front-end developer

localize.description: 学得更快，赚得更多，成为真正的独角兽开发者! 发现如何学习、了解设计、业务以及作为开发人员成长所必需的技能。掌握工具与方法，你会对小型与大型项目充满信心。
localize.tagline: 晋升为初级前端开发人员

localize.description: 學得更快，賺得更多，成爲真正的獨角獸開發者! 發現如何學習、瞭解設計、業務以及作爲開發人員成長所必需的技能。掌握工具與方法，你會對小型與大型項目充滿信心。
localize.tagline: 晉升爲初級前端開發人員
